Articles.Content: **Edited <time datetime="2018-11-09T02:21:20Z" title="11/09/2018 02:21  AM" data-short="5 yr">November 9, 2018</time> by Thingymajigy**
You did a good job on this.
Well done, seems like you took inspiration from my F-22 lol looks really similar, wings, tail and rudders

> 
> Well done, seems like you took inspiration from my F-22 lol looks really similar, wings, tail and rudders

Oh yeah, I did, the tail feathers were almost copy and paste. Sorry for not mentioning that.

Cockpit layout and fuel pods based heavily on this great plane:[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114048-K-22H3-Stock-Air-Superiority-Fighter](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114048-K-22H3-Stock-Air-Superiority-Fighter)

> 
> Oh yeah, I did, the tail feathers were almost copy and paste. Sorry for not mentioning that.
> Cockpit layout and fuel pods based heavily on this great plane:[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114048-K-22H3-Stock-Air-Superiority-Fighter](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114048-K-22H3-Stock-Air-Superiority-Fighter)

Lol don't worry, im just glad someone find my work usefull.

Great job! Well at least there is a couple days to have fun with it before 1.0. 

P.S. I love the cockpit design. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That looks very nice! I love interiors and part-built cockpits.

+rep
Great looking plane but it looks like a hybrid of the F22 and the F35 vs just an F22. The air intakes are styled after the F35.

> 
> Great looking plane but it looks like a hybrid of the F22 and the F35 vs just an F22. The air intakes are styled after the F35.

The description did say intakes needed work. I was never and still am not good with intakes. And I didn't work on it because it's a 0.90 plane which got trashed by the update...
